Text: The Kyu-Miyake (旧宮家 , literally former Miyake ) , also known as the Old Imperial Family (旧皇族), were branches of the Japanese Imperial Family created from branches of the Fushimi-no-miya house.
Triplets:<The Kyu-Miyake

Text: Ōke:  After that point, only the immediate family of Hirohito and those of his three brothers retained membership in the Imperial Family.
